Tuta Absoluta.description: Tuta absoluta, also known as the tomato leafminer, is a highly destructive pest...
Tuta Absoluta.symptoms: Look for mines in leaves, stems, and fruits...
Tuta Absoluta.prevention: Use pheromone traps, crop rotation, and resistant varieties...
Tuta Absoluta.treatment: Apply biological control agents like Bacillus thuringiensis...

Botrytis.description: Botrytis cinerea is a necrotrophic fungus that affects many plant species...
Botrytis.symptoms: Gray mold on leaves, stems, and fruits...
Botrytis.prevention: Improve air circulation, avoid overhead watering...
Botrytis.treatment: Remove infected plant parts and apply fungicides...
